msbt.message: Hello, ! The time is now : .
I trust you've all found excellent ways to spend your day?You'll wear yourself out if you try to pack too much activity in all at once. So be sure you take breaks!
Hello, everyone. This is Tom Nook! It's : this happy , , .
Hello, everyone This is Tom Nook<10_4 /> It's currently : , , .This is a late-night broadcast for all you night owls out there!
Good day, everyone! I'd like to wish you all a happy New Year! May it be a joyous one for us all, hm? It's : this happy , , .
Hello, everyone, this is Tom Nook! It's currently : on , , . Ah! That means it's time for the Lunar New Year!I'd like to wish you all great happiness and prosperity!

Hello, everyone! Tom Nook here! Brrr It's so coldIt's currently , : on , , and my whiskers are nearly frozenHowever, I'll still deliver the news of the day like always! I'm not about to let this cold get to me, no, no!
Hello, everyone! How are we all doing this fine day?It's currently : , and I'd like to squeeze in a broadcast, if I may. And since I have the micI may!
Today also happens to be the birthday of our dear, dear island resident, !
Today also happens to be the birthday of our dear, dear island resident, !
Today also happens to be the birthday of our dear, dear island resident, !
It just so happens that today is a very special day for some of our friends. It's and
Yes, yes! Today is a special day for some island friends. It's birthday time for and
it's also 's birthday!
it's also 's birthday!
well, many other residents! What a special day for so many of you!
Congratulations to you!
I wish each of you a very special birthday! Yes, indeed!
Now for today's news
Now for today's other news
Also
Oho! Bunny Day is nearly upon us!Seems like this event often coincides with a change in the weather.But I feel like it kind of snuck up on me this year.
Today is Bunny Day! What's more, we have a special guest who's come a long way to celebrate with us. I hope everyone stops by the plaza to meet him.

Today is May Day! Be sure to stop by and see me in Resident Services for May Day Tickets.I'm giving them out to express my appreciation for our island residents.I hope you'll all take advantage of this opportunity to explore an island far from here.

Happy May Day, everyone!Be sure to stop by and see me in Resident Services for May Day Tickets.I'm giving them out to express my appreciation for our island residents.I hope you'll all take advantage of this opportunity to explore an island far from here.

What's more, it's May Day, everyone!Be sure to stop by and see me in Resident Services for May Day Tickets.I'm giving them out to express my appreciation for our island residents.I hope you'll all take advantage of this opportunity to explore an island far from here.

What's more, I'm running a special May Day event!Be sure to stop by and see me in Resident Services for May Day Tickets.I'm giving them out to express my appreciation for our island residents.I hope you'll all take advantage of this opportunity to explore an island far from here.

I have exciting news about a new event. It's called May Day, and I'm handing out May Day Tickets now.With your ticket, you'll be able to visit an extra-special remote island that's full of adventure and fun.However, since Resident Services is under construction, I've left your ticket with Orville at the airport.I do hope you'll participate, hm? Your ticket is only valid for today, so don't miss out!

Right now on we're celebrating Nature Day!Yes, yes, this important festivity reminds us that our little island is part of a bigger world. May 4th is the last day for all the special activities, so I hope everyone does something nice for the island!

Let's see, it's June. And June is a lovely time for love, hm? Some might even say it's wedding seasonHow would one stage an island wedding in June So many themes to considerAh, the mind wanders. Well, I simply wish all June lovebirds lasting joy. Yes, yes!

I have an important announcement from our dear friend Blathers!In honor of International Museum Day, our museum will host a stamp rally from May 18th to May 31st. If that sounds as interesting to you as it does to me, then by all means head to the museum and give it a try!

Later on today, we'll be putting on a fireworks show! Yes, yesit's a seasonal tradition.There will be colorful fireworks blooming in the night sky and a special raffle to enjoyI do hope you'll gather 'round with friends to celebrate. Enjoy!

We've been assessing the condition of the sea around our islandand I'm pleased to announce it's safe.Safe for swimming, that is. Oho! From now on, swimming freely in the sea is permitted for all!And given the exceptional clarity and depth of the water, it seems free diving is even on the table.Now, we do expect everyone will want to equip themselves with a proper wet suit first, yes?So I'm also pleased to announce a new line of wet suits available in the shop or through Nook Shopping.Swimming and diving are both great fun and invigorating exercise, so I do encourage you to take part. Enjoy!

As I mentioned in the cards I sent out, the sea surrounding our island is now open for swimming!Yes, yesthe water is clear and deep, so it's also perfect for diving below the surface.However! Safety first, hm? A proper wet suit is a must before dipping even a single toe into the water.Fortunately, a new line of wet suits is now available via Nook Shopping and our local shop. Yes, yes!So! Suit up and enjoy all the sea has to offer. I look forward to seeing you out there!

We've been assessing the condition of the sea around our islandand I'm pleased to announce it's safe.Safe for swimming, that is. Oho! From now on, swimming freely in the sea is permitted for all!And given the exceptional clarity and depth of the water, it seems free diving is even on the table.Now, we do expect everyone will want to equip themselves with a proper wet suit first, yes?So if you need a wet suit, do please visit Timmy, or check out the Nook Shopping catalog.Swimming and diving are both great fun and invigorating exercise, so I do encourage you to take part. Enjoy!

As I mentioned in the cards I sent out, the sea surrounding our island is now open for swimming!Yes, yesthe water is clear and deep, so it's also perfect for diving below the surface.However! Safety first, hm? A proper wet suit is a must before dipping even a single toe into the water.So if you'd like to take part, do please visit Timmy, or check the Nook Shopping catalog for wet suits.So! Suit up and enjoy all the sea has to offer. I look forward to seeing you out there!

October is here, and that means it's Halloween season. And what would Halloween be without pumpkins, hm?Now, pumpkins aren't just for eating. No, no! They can also be made into DIY items, such as jack-o'-lanterns!

Both Leif and Nook's Cranny have begun selling pumpkin starts. They can get youstarted growing some!Also, Nook's Cranny now has candy for sale. I highly suggest stocking up in time for Halloween night!You never know what kind of Halloween mischief you'll need some candy to ward off. Oho!

Both Leif and Timmy have begun selling pumpkin starts. They'll help you getstarted growing some!Also, Timmy now has candy for sale. I highly suggest stocking up in time for Halloween night!You never know what kind of Halloween mischief you'll need some candy to ward off. Oho!

Nook's Cranny has begun selling pumpkin starts. Stop by, and they'll get youstarted growing some!They also have candy for sale now, so while you're there, don't forget to stock up for Halloween night!You never know what kind of Halloween mischief you'll need some candy to ward off. Oho!

Timmy tells me he's begun selling pumpkin starts, so stop by, and he can get youstarted growing some!He also says he has candy for sale. While you're visiting, don't forget to stock up for Halloween night!You never know what kind of Halloween mischief you'll need some candy to ward off. Oho!

Halloween is tonight, and from 5 PM to midnight, we're throwing an event to celebrate!Everyone wearing a costume will be passing around candy, so be sure to have yours ready, hm?I can't wait to see everyone there. Yes, yes! This is going to be fun!
It's Halloween, and from now until midnight, we're having an event to celebrate!Everyone is in their costumes and passing around candy, so please put yours on and join the fun! Yes, yes!
I'm also looking forward to seeing everyone's costumes, hm!Be sure to have your costumes ready before Halloween on the 31st. Yes, yes! You won't want to miss out!
It's finally Toy Day!I hear a certain someone will be visiting us to deliver gifts. Do say hello from me if you get a chance!
AH! Come to think of itI hear a certain someone is here to deliver gifts. Do say hello for me if you see them, hm?
gained a new neighbor today. !
I hope you give lots of great advice about living here!
If you happen to see , please give a warm welcome!
I'm sure will be very busy unpacking today, so consider checking in on !
Now On to the next topic!
Our dear will be saying goodbye to this island for personal reasons. be gone tomorrow, so please make sure you take time to get in your goodbyes today.

It's come to my attention that a certain suspicious character is making the rounds of nearby islands. This individual is apparently peddling artwork and antiquities of sometimes dubious authenticity and worth. Just goes to show, we must all be careful with our Bells, hm? And when it comes to new vendors, be vigilant!
Ah, one item I should share
Come to think of it
You know

Time passes by so quickly, and today is the final day of .<10_4 /> I appreciate all you've done for me this year!I want you to enjoy the last moments of . Yes, yes, leave nothing undone that needs doing.May you have a lovely new year as well!

According to the forecast, we should be able to see shooting stars in the sky tonight!Countless stars shooting across the void I'm already looking forward to seeing how many wishes I can make!Please come out to enjoy the stars if you have time this evening.

Right now on you can observe shooting stars!They are indeed a sight to behold, so I hope you all move  to look up at the starry skies tonight!Now, they say if you spot a shooting star and make a wish with , your wish will come true I have no idea if that's true or not, but it doesn't hurt to try if you find yourself curious about such things!
I can't say I have much in the way of news to report to you today.
This morning, I happened upon a rare-colored seashell while walking along the beach. They're known as summer shells. And, as the name suggests, you can only find them during the summer!
This is a good opportunity to enjoy some DIY crafting and turn those shells into summer memorabilia.
You couldcraft a shell wreath with the recipe I just sent to users of the DIY Recipes app!
This is a good opportunity to enjoy some DIY crafting and turn those shells into summer memorabilia.

Earlier on my daily constitutional, I was overcome with fall feelings when I saw what had dropped off a tree. You might be able to shake loose an acorn or a pine cone if you try. Give yourself that fall experience too!

Earlier, on my daily constitutional, I saw something had fallen off a tree! Perhaps someone shook it down. We're getting near the end of the season for acorns and pine cones, so gather them up while you can! I want everyone to enjoy this last taste of fall!
Ah!
Let me just update your DIY Recipes app with a delightful recipe for a tree's bounty little tree!
Also, anyone who can craft fall items should do so, and then use them to decorate the island for the season!

This morning on my daily walk, I spotted a mushroom! We are well into fall now, aren't we?Mushrooms aren't just a staple flavor for fall. They're also good for crafting fall DIY memories! Yes, yes, I want you all to enjoy fall the DIY way!
Ah!
DIY Recipes users will see that I've sent over a recipe for a wonderful mushroom wreath. Try it out!

By the way, all the mushrooms that grow on this island are safe to eat.But identifying mushrooms can be a very challenging task elsewhere.When you're not on this island, if you see mushrooms growing, DO NOT EAT THEM! You should have them checked first by someone knowledgeable about these things.

Snowy days like today do chill you right to the coreBut the sight of snowflakes dancing on the breeze is pleasant to behold!If you haven't already done so, get out there with a net and try to gently scoop them up.
Ah!
I've sent a snowflake wreath recipe to all you DIY Recipes fans.Yes, yes! It's a simple recipe that requires only snowflakes, so I do hope you give it a try.
It'd warm this raccoon's heart to see everyone crafting winter memories with the snowflakes they gather.

Today's another one of those cold days that chill you through and throughBut it's perfect weather for building a friendly island Snowboy!When snow's piled up outside, you can sometimes find rolled-up balls of snow while you're out and about.Keep rolling them up to make them bigger, stick one on top of another, and you'll have made a Snowboy!
Today I became keenly aware of how deep we are into fall when a maple leaf fluttered by me as I was walking. I hope all of you get to enjoy hunting the leaves during the brief time they are around.
Ah!
I've sent a recipe to the DIY Recipes app. It's for a red-leaf pile, and it's a great way to make fall memories!
Try gently scooping up maple leaves with a net, and thenmaybe you can use them in a DIY project, hm?
This morning as I was walking, beautiful cherry-blossom petals fluttered before my eyes!I hope everyone takes time to enjoy these blossoms while they're here.
Ah!
I sent an update to the DIY Recipes app. You'll now find the recipe for a delightful outdoor picnic set.Admire the cherry blossoms while enjoying some homemade lunch, hm?
Scoop up cherry-blossom petals with a net, and thenmaybe you can use them in a DIY project, hm?
This morning, while I was enjoying my daily constitutional, some bamboo caught my attention. Did you know fresh bamboo, known as young spring bamboo, can be harvested this time of year?
Ah!
I've updated the DIY Recipes app with a bamboo noodle slide recipe that uses young spring bamboo. Whew! That was a mouthful! But do try your hand at this once-a-year DIY project, hm?
I hope you all take advantage of this opportunity to craft seasonal DIY projects. Yes, yes!
By the way, island friends

Don't forget to check the Passport app once in a while, hm?We recommend that if you visit other islands, you update your photo, title, and comment from time to time.The information in your Passport app can be used to spur conversation, so please make full use of it!

Have you been using the Nook Stop inside Resident Services?You can earn bonus miles once a day just by accessing it.Using it multiple days in a row will give you even more miles, so make sure you check in every day!
While on your walks, are you looking up at the sky or looking down to admire the island scenery?If you move  up or down, you can change your perspective and enjoy different views.

Are you making good use of the recycle box inside Resident Services?The recycle box stores items our residents don't need so someone else can pick them up later.You might find treasures other folks have left there if you check it from time to time, you know.
Now, I'm going to share some info on highly prized items you can get via the miles redemption service.

Today's top tip is aboutthe Custom Design Pro Editor!This is an upgrade for the Custom Designs app.It has a more professional color customization feature as well as design creation functionality!Without Custom Design Pro Editor, it's still possible to receive and use Pro Custom Designs, but If you want to make your own Pro Custom Designs, by all means, do consider getting this upgrade.

Today's top tip is about Pretty Good Tools Recipes!As the title suggests, these are recipes for pretty good tools that won't break all that easily. If you have a mind to upgrade from a flimsy tool, you might think about redeeming some miles for this item.

Today's top tip is about Tool Ring: It's Essential!Have any of you gotten used to deserted-island life and started carrying around a lot of tools? Maybe swapping between them all is starting to wear you out.The Tool Ring lets you favorite up to eight tools in your pocket so you can easily switch between them! I can't recommend this item highly enough for those who want quick access to a variety of tools.

Today's top tip is aboutthe Pocket Organization Guide!The longer you live in one place, the more things you tend to accumulate. The same is true on this island Anyone out there feeling a little overloaded? If so, you're in luck!Once you master the techniques in this guide, you'll be able to stuff even morestuff in your pockets.Better living through organization!<10_4 /> I hope all of you pick up this item to live the tidiest life possible.

Some days you just need to talk abouthairstyles and colors!Did you know that some guides, like Top 8 Pop Hairstyles, offer ideas for changing up the look of your hair? You can give yourself a fresh new look if you have a vanity, a mirror an item of that nature, hm?Any stylish folks out there who want to stay ahead of the trends should pick up this guide!
I'd like to share a little info that might just improve your quality of life here on the island.

When you got your tent, you also received a portable radio. It's great for enjoying all kinds of music.However, there are other audio players out there, like record players, that you can use as well! Just imagine listening to your favorite songs whenever you wantYou can purchase music to use with those audio players from Nook Shopping. Keep a sharp eye out!

You've made a big decision to start a new life here on .Do you want to make big, bold changes to your personal style too? If so, I have good news for you!Vanities, mirrors, and other items used for checking your looks can be used to CHANGE your looks too!From hairstyles and colors to your very face, you can enjoy being the you you want to be every day!

Folks with that I'm-gonna-be-stylish- even-on-a-deserted-island mindset will want a closet or wardrobe.As long as you have one set up in your home, you can use it to change your entire outfit easily.Enjoy a little fashion show of your own at home to develop your style, then share it with the world!

On those long nightsenjoy the lovely illumination of candles or lamps!Using different lighting sources or changing their locations can dramatically alter the feel of a room. All of you fussy interior-design types should try gathering various kinds of lighting to use in your designs!
Are you enjoying crafting those lovely DIY projects, hm?If you haven't made anything yet, please stop by Resident Services for a free workshop!
That's all from me! Bye now!
There's really not much news today, so instead I'll share some valuable tips about living!
Now for today's news
Oh my stars! Would you believe it? There isn't any!
Oho! Would you believe it? Today's newsis that there isn't any news!
Well, this is amusing There isn't any news to report!
Hm Well, they do say that no news is good news, so just enjoy another peaceful day on !
Well, I guess that makes this a rather short news broadcast, hm?
That's all from me. I do hope you all enjoy another fine day of luxurious living!
That's all from me. Time for you all to get out and enjoy your day. Yes, yes!
